summary: A young woman and her brother explore the history of their grandfather, who died in the WW2. They start contacting the men who flew with him, asking them about who he was.
cast: Jun'ichi Okada|Haruma Miura|Mao Inoue|Gaku Hamada|Hirofumi Arai|Shôta Sometani|Takahiro Miura|Tatsuya Ueda|Ken Aoki|Rakuto Tochihara|Ippei Sasaki|Yûya Endô|Takehiro Hira|Tarô Suruga|Toshihiro Yashiba|Kisuke Iida|Ryôhei Abe|Akio Nakadai|Shûichirô Masuda|Bob Werley|Kazue Fukiishi|Jun Fubuki|Tomoko Saitô|Ozuno Nakamura|Yûki Furukawa|Naoto Itô|Chinami Suzuki|Miho Nakanishi|Nanase Iwai|Nanaka Yagi|Min Tanaka|Gaku Yamamoto|Mikijirô Hira|Isao Hashizume|Isao Natsuyagi|Kyle Card|Charles Glover|Motokatsu Suzuki|Shota Taniguchi
title: Eien no 0
